front.title: Probe Droid
front.gametext: Deploys only if a Star Destroyer on table. Once during each of your control phases, may peek at X cards randomly selected from opponent's hand, where X = number of [Light Side Force] icons at same site. May Force drain, initiate battle and be battled.
front.lore: Arakyd Viper probe droid. Has sensors specifically designed to detect traces of Rebel activity. Equipped with an auto-destruct mechanism. A highly durable spy droid.
